pkgmetadata.longdescription: Miscellaneous Functions Used at 'Numeract LLC' // Contains functions useful for debugging, set operations on vectors, and 'UTC' date and time functionality. It adds a few vector manipulation verbs to 'purrr' and 'dplyr' packages. It can also generate an R file to install and update packages to simplify deployment into production. The functions were developed at the data science firm 'Numeract LLC' and are used in several packages and projects.
